task_description: Navigate to 尾上町（バス）. Head straight along the narrow street, passing the TM-43 Building, for about 72m until you reach the large intersection with the main road (Kannai Odori). Turn left at the intersection (Tokiwacho 3-chome). Continue along the wide, tree-lined street for 48m; the destination, Onoe-cho bus stop, will be on the left.
